scripts.Build-Frontend: cd udagram-frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.Deploy-Frontend: cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.Build-Backend: cd udagram-api && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd .. && cd udagram-frontend && npm run test
